channel.title: Amazon on Ronit Malik
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon on Ronit Malik

item.title: Amazon Price Tracker
item.description: This project was part of my youtube channel where I build a yahoo finance web-scrapper to get stock prices from yahoo finance, I used the Yahoo_fin package to get the prices for various stock prices and ran further trend analysis. The main goal of this project was to explore the yahoo_fin package. The following video for this project can be found on my Youtube Channel You can view the source code for this project on my Github
